column2: Send an offer to join [Root.GetBestName]'s defense.
Send an offer to join [Root.GetBestName]'s defense.
[From.GetBestName] has offered to join me in my defense.
[From.GetBestName] has accepted my offer, we will ride to his defense.
[From.GetBestName] has refused my offer, but has sent his gratitude.
